text: Beach soccer competition at the 2016 Asian Beach Games was held in Da Nang, Vietnam from 25 September to 2 October 2016 at Biển Đông Park. ==Medalists== {| |- |Men | Shingo Terukina Yusuke Kawai Shotaro Haraguchi Yuki Nakahara Naoya Matsuo Teruki Tabata Takaaki Oba Takuya Akaguma Takasuke Goto Ozu | Amjad Al-Hamdani Abdullah Al-Sauti Jalal Al-Sinani Yahya Al-Araimi Mundhar Al-Araimi Mashal Al-Araimi Nooh Al-Zadjali Khalid Al-Araimi Hani Al-Dhabit Haitham Harib | Mohamad Choker Abbas Zeineddine Mohamad Ahmad Choker Mohamad Mechleb Matar Mustafa Al-Zein Mohamad Merhi Mohamad Sleiman Ahmad Grada Sameh Jalal Hussein Salameh |} ==Results== ===First round=== ====Group A==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;
